name: Happy Life
description:
The theme of LD46 is Keep it alive.

You do your best to keep your digital pet alive, but at what cost? What other aspects of your life need to be kept alive as well?

Everything could hinge on one stressful evening in this point-and-click life management sim. Can you keep your happy life together for another day, or will it all come crashing down?

Pay attention to the important things and take it seriously, but don't forget to live a little!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/happy-life

check out more of Alejandro's art at www.chorizocomic.com!
